General.Name: Guangdong Tianhe Agricultural Means
General.Description: Guangdong Tianhe Agricultural Means of Production Co., Ltd. provides crop solutions and agricultural products. The company sells nitrogenous and potash fertilizers, agri-chemicals, and seeds, as well as engages in warehousing and logistics activities. Its agri-chemicals include public health pesticides, seed dressing agents, preservation agents, original drugs, herbicides, fungicides, and pesticides; and fertilizers comprise foliar, specialty fertilizers, blends, NPK, potash, and urea. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.
